scope:
Build a terminal notepad application using the Textual library. The application should have a TUI with:

1. A sidebar listing all notes.
2. A main editor pane for syntax-free text editing.
3. Keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+N to create new note, Ctrl+S to save current note, and Ctrl+D to delete selected note).
4. Notes persisted in a JSON file with title/body/timestamps.
5. Dark theme UI.
6. Responsive layout that adjusts when the terminal is resized.

The application should handle edge cases such as non-existent notes for deletion or updates gracefully.

tasks.title: Responsive Layout Adjustments for Resizing Terminal
tasks.description: Modify the CSS in MainApp to ensure that the layout adjusts when the terminal is resized. Use Textual's grid system to define responsive columns and rows. Tests: Verify that resizing the terminal triggers appropriate layout changes.
